title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Kalynivka, Andriyivka, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted a...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Kalynivka, Andriyivka, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Kurdumivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
